ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to use multiple Band-Series to simulate a Fan Chart
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how to use multiple [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.RenderableSeries.FastBandRenderableSeries.html']FastBandRenderableSeries[/url] to simulate a Fan Chart.
The [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.RenderableSeries.FastBandRenderableSeries.html']FastBandRenderableSeries[/url] requires an [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.DataSeries.XyyDataSeries%602.html']XyyDataSeries[/url], which has X,Y0,Y1 points, to display a solid band between high and low Y-value.
In this example, we overlay several Band-Series with varying opacity to simulate a Fan-chart.
